Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Input event log tabular data Activities Receive Application RA Validate Form VF Assess Eligibility AE Request Missing Info RMI Approval Decision AD Send Confirmation SC Archive Case AC Cases Case 1 RA VF AE RMI VF AD SC AC Case 2 RA VF AE AD SC AC Case 3 RA VF AE RMI RMI VF AD SC AC Every trace starts with RA VF AE After AE Case 2 directly AD Cases 1 3 RMI

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After AE segment RMI followed by VF This segment repeats or skipped leading to AD VF after RMI in all cases Core structure RA VF AE optional loop RMI VF then AD SC AC

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Propose structure RA VF AE Loop RMI VF AD SC AC Use loop operator after AE for optional repetitions

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Explain traces with loop A RMI VF B AD Execute A then B exit or repeat Fits retry cycle

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - NE
Text: Choose simplest loop * ( RMI VF , AD ) for balancing fitness precision simplicity Ignores multiple RMI before VF and strict zero iteration semantics

Name: Validation - NE
Text: Verify traces with proposed tree Trace 2 AD direct after AE not perfectly fit by mandatory A first Trace 3 RMI RMI VF not fit by RMI VF body

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: Consider alternatives like X AD RMI VF or different loop placements but stick to flawed * structure
